import React, {Component} from "react"; export default class FilterContainer extends Component { getFilters = () => { const {getFilters} = this.props let updatedFilters = { gender: this.getCheckedValues("gender"), size: this.getCheckedValues("size"), category: this.getCheckedValues("category"), colour: this.getCheckedValues("colour"), } this.setState({filters: updatedFilters}, () => { console.log("Updated Filters: ", this.state.filters) getFilters(this.state.filters) }) } // Helper function to get the values from a checkbox group and add them // to their respective arrays getCheckedValues = (filterName) => { let checkboxes = document.getElementsByName(filterName) let checkedValues = [] checkboxes.forEach((checkbox) => { if(checkbox.checked) { checkedValues.push(checkbox.value) } }) return checkedValues } render() { return (

Gender

Size

Category

Colour

Price

) } }
